unnormalised: ## Mhaje Chaik Mhoje Dukhnni Bori Korunk Puro Asa? (Vokhdamni Mapanchi Uballi)
normalised: Mhozo Chai Mhoje Dukhepon Borim Korunk Purench Asa? (Vokhdamni Mapanchi Pisai Eka Nazarient)

unnormalised: Dekhun, fatlea satolleak, mhaka doko ulo, mhaka distalem zoxem eka cricket-achea pongddan mhoje kopaleant bhonvryo kortale. Dhirachem, vaidyok vicharachem monis asun (vacha: konn-eklo zaka Google-ar lakshonn polleunk daktara kodden vochunk sodta), hanvem apnnak-uch nidaan korunk tharailo. Uktailem, mhaka "gonnbhir doko" asa internetachea ekdom sattek nidanapramannem. Borem. Punn kitlem gonnbhir *thik*? Tem 500mg Paracetamol doko aslo, vo "ammyek ulo korun randdun ghe" dukhichem patlle? Hachean mhaka vaidyok vicharanchea mapanchi yad aile, ani mhaka sang, to ek unmatacho chollo asa!
normalised: Tor, fatlea satolleant, mhaka mathear dukhi suru zali, ti eka cricket tim mhoje kopalleant provao kortat tenna koxi zata tashi zali. Dhirachim, voizki-utsook monis zaun (vach: konn voizki D-R gelea baddal internetar lakshanonn sodtat), hanv swatahuch nidan korunk tharailo. Uktto zalear, mhaka internetachea khubuch barik nidana pormonnem "ghor dukhi" asli. Bori. Punn kitli ghor *exact*? Ti panchsh milligram Paracetamol zati dukhi asli, vo "amaiak uloi ani rodd" pachi painch asli? Hem sodankal mhaka voizkechea mapancher chintunk laglem, ani hanv tuka sangtam, ti eka ranantli safari!

unnormalised: Vichar kora. Kitlem vokhod *ghayje* tumi gheunk? Tumkam sangtat gheunk, sangata, 10 ml khoonkichem sherbet. Punn konnachem ml? Tem mhojem lhan, chai-k laglam ml, vo ek bore bhaxhen keli asli, sarkari-manyata divpak ml? Ani ml *kitem* asa, khoremponnim? Tem fattavo sangpachem ek borem utor "thoddem thoddem"? Mhoji aaji tem "andaaz" korun mapta, zachem sumarponnim bhaxantor asa "ek andaz." Mhaka patie, ticho andaaz sumarponnim 50% chukta.
normalised: Tacho vichar kor. Tumi kitli vokhdam gheunk zai? Tuka dhav milliliter khoklecho sirop gheunk sangtat. Punn konnachea milliliter? Tem mhojea lhan, chayechea dag laglelea chamchacho milliliter, vo sarkem kelibret kelolea, sorkar-mannea dilolea milliliter? Ani milliliter *asalem* kiteak, khorem? Tem fokot "thoddem" sangchea ek utar di? Mhaje aji tem "andaaz" diun maptelem, je sadharan "ek andaz" zaun somzota. Mhojem zati mhaka sod, ticho andaaz sadharan pachas percentani chukta.

unnormalised: Ani tantun asat tapman. Tumi taposanv bhogtat, tor tumi tapmapanchi bazu ghetat. Tem 100°F vachta. Borem, vaitt dista. Punn tem 100°F Delhi unhalleant vaitt, vo 100°F "tumich ek raddiyantle gheunk" vaitt? Paristhiti mahatvachea asa, lokamno! Ani ami Celsiusacher suruvat korunakai. Mhaka azun kalnakar ani chaiachem bollachem cup bhettun ani gennak gheun mhaka tem konvert korunk kalnakar zaina. Tem soglle ekdom gunthagunthachem asa ani hanv suru kelea porim dhogda zata.
normalised: Ushneta aslem. Tuka khor zatat tor tumi thermometer ghettat. Tem eksh Fahrenheit dakhaita. Thik, kharab asalem dixtta. Punn tem Delhi ushnent eksh Fahrenheit kharab, vo eksh Fahrenheit "tumi apleak eka kamblhench udaink zai" kharab? Sandarbh zori, monis! Ani Celsiusancher zaitar utorunk zaina. Mhaka ajunui tem calculator ani eka dhadd chayechea cup-a zaitar garz nastan mhojea mathear bodolunk mellona. Tem khubuch gondsogonds ani mhaka hanv suru kelea tenna poros ani chinta zatat.

unnormalised: Ani vazon kitem? Doktor sangta tumkam 5 kgs kammi korunk zai. Sopelem, nhui? Faqt vadhik samosak kammi korunk. Punn maga tumi tarajecher paule ghalun, ani tem ek Bollywood nattyachem drishya zata. Tarajem tumcher ankadde fulta zoxem laganchea velar fulaum ghalta. 70.5 kgs! 71 kgs! 69.8 kgs! Kitem asa? Mhojem tarajem mhaka fott sangta? Tem mhaje derachem biryani rutichem nirdhaar korta? Vismoy asa! Tarajem mhaje bhavnachim “Kabaddi” khellta.
normalised: Ani vazan kitla zait? Doktor sangta tuka panch kilogram kham korunk zai. Sompem, sori? Fokot vaddaviche samosa kham korunk naka. Punn tea vellar tumi tarazvancher paulear, tem Bollywood natkantlean asli koxi dista. Tarazvo tuka lagneachea velar distat tech zate confetti kaddun numbera dakhaita. Satt point panch kilogram! Ekhatar kilogram! Ekon satter point atth kilogram! Konnachem aslem? Mhojem tarazvo mhaka fott martat? Tem mhajea raatiche biryani vichearachi choukashi kortat? Dhast zata! Tarazvo mhojea bhavnanancher “Kabaddi” kholota.

unnormalised: Vazonachea bhaxhen, hanvem eka resipecher cholunk yatan keli zaka "2 gram kesar" magle. Don gram! Tumkam khabar asa kitlem kesar asa? Tem mhaka sarkhem, hanv sope zaiteli ek durbeachem telescope vaprun eke Bollywood natyak kitlem dukh asa tem mapunk sangtali. Kesar mhajea mhoineachea kiraiapordha chodd molachem, ani mhaka 2 gram thik bhaxhen mapunk zai? Punn tumkam disun yeta, mhaka Bollywood nattyacher kitlem dukh asa tem mapunk sangtat.
normalised: Vazanchi utor, hanven eka recipe-ak "don gram saffron" zai mhunn sanglea. Don gram! Tuka khabar asa tem kitla? Tem mhaka aakharani jalebichea eka durbeenani tarkam mezunk ditat koxi zata. Saffron mhojea mahineache kiraien poros vaddau zata ani mhaka sarkhem don gram mezunk ditat? Dusanv tujem mhoje sangata, mhaka Bollywood filmant kitli dukhi asa sarkhem mezunk ditat.

unnormalised: Punn he, kami khorch korunakai, nhui? Ami vostum mapunk yatan kortanv, rutuk foll karta, ani tem soglle ekarthacho korunk yatan kortanv. Tor, tumi fudden eka gunthagunthachea vaidyok mapanan melltolam, faqt yad doura: Tem thoddem andazachem khell asa, thoddem shastra, ani bollbhar porvacho asa. Ani kadchit, faqt kadchit, ek chaiachem bollachem cup tem soglle bore korunk shakta. Vo atle, tumi gunthagunthachem mapan thodde velar bhogunk visar korunk shakta. Chai sumarponnim 150 ml mhoje andazachem, zaka mhojea swatakchea volume mapanachem paddhat zata.
normalised: Punn hei, ami atanch proitn kortanv, sori? Ami vastu meztav, track kortav, ani ek arth daddunk proitn kortav. Tor, tumi fuddlea vellar eka gondsogonds voizki mapachem samkem ravlear, tumi fokot hem yad doura: Tem thoddem andazacho khel zaun asa, thoddem vigyan zaun asa, ani khupuch boreanchi umeed zaun asa. Ani koxe tori, eka dhadd chayechea cup-a tem bore korunk zata. Vo thoddea vella khatir, tumchea gondsogonds mapanchem duk bore zata. Chai sumar eksh ani pachas milliliter mhojea andaza-mazantleant zaitar zai, je mhoji khas utpan vichearachem sthaan.
